channel.title: I think this is where this goes... "deposit invo" lags hard when pressed
channel.description: For some reason when a player clicks deposit invo it lags for about 10 seconds. Im not very good at doing anything client sided, but if anyone can point me in the right direction or give me some insight i'd really appreciate it! :o

item.title: I think this is where this goes... "deposit invo" lags hard when pressed
item.dc:creator: @purestmage74 purestmage74
item.description:
@purestmage74 wrote:

I had the same problem, went shufflin through the code a few times with a few different methods added in.

And finally i came out with this ’ 100% ’ lagg free deposit inventory.

ClickingButtons.java of course:

/* Deposit Inventory [FIXED] */ case 89223: for(int itemID = 0; itemID < 1; itemID++) { for(int invSlot = 0; invSlot < 28; invSlot++) { c.getItems().bankItem(itemID, invSlot, 2147000000); } } break;

Read full topic
